rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C170450

definition: Terminology relevant to the origin source for datasets in the Define-XML document.
name: Origin Source

terms.definition: A person responsible for the conduct of the clinical trial at a trial site. If a trial is conducted by a team of individuals at the trial site, the investigator is the responsible leader of the team and may be called the principal investigator.

An individual, company, institution, or organization that takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. [After ICH E6, WHO, 21 CFR 50.3 (e), and after IDMP]
An individual who is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.
A person or agency that promotes or exchanges goods or services for money. (NCI)
